title: 007: The World is Not Enough
description: 007 – The World Is Not Enough is a first-person shooter video game, released by Electronic Arts publisher to fans in 2000. The game is the seventh installment in the game The World Is Not Enough and is the sequel to the title 006 – The World Is Not Enough. Coming to 007 – The World Is Not Enough, players will play the role of James Bond to prevent ongoing terrorism in the waters of Istanbul. The game has two main game modes, single-player and multiplayer (up to 4 players can be played together). 007 – The World Is Not Enough has 14 missions in the main mode (singleplayer). All missions take place on the railroads, in the context of the player slipping down from a mountain. The missions of the game are mainly to destroy the AI-controlled enemies that appear on the tracks, but sometimes the player must also rescue hostages or collect a few items. Before entering a game screen, players are allowed to choose the difficulty level that suits their abilities.

1942 is a shooting strategy game developed by Capcom and released to fans in 1984. It can be considered this is the first game in the series of games for the 9x generation. The game is set in World War II, so players will be able to take part in extremely dramatic air battles. Initially, your character will be in control of the Lockheed P – 38 Lightning (dubbed “Super Ace”). Using your plane to shoot down enemy aircraft, and moving quickly to avoid enemy fire will help you win the battle. In addition, players can upgrade the combat power by tame a small number of small aircraft to become your minions. Winning each match, the character will receive a number of equipment upgrades and aircraft repairs.

title: Adventures Of The Smurfs, The
description: Adventures Of The Smurfs is a video game adventure simulation genre, released by the publisher Infogrames to fans in 2000. Coming to Adventures Of The Smurfs, players will transform into Handy Smurf and participate in creating a Machine to rescue his friends. The game takes players through sixteen extremely interesting levels. Each level has a different nature, map, gameplay. They can take place in a river, a mine or in an airplane, … The game is mainly interacted from the first perspective (from above), although the player can rotate the camera to see from other perspectives. But actually, the game is only optimal when viewed from the first perspective. With fun graphics and cute sounds, Adventures Of The Smurfs is definitely a good choice for those who want to relieve stress after hours of work and stressful work.

title: Alice In Wonderland
description: Alice In Wonderland is an adventure, role-playing game developed by Digital Eclipse Software and released to fans in 2000. The game was built on the famous cartoon film of the same name. However, some segments have been changed to suit the most immersive adventure game. Entering the game, transforming into Alice, the player will set foot in the white rabbit to come to Wonderland – a vivid, shimmering world with hundreds of different species of plants and animals invested in different designs. Throughout the game, most of the main character’s missions are to search for certain items. However, Wonderland is too large to find them will not be easy. Therefore, players can interact with other characters to find their own suggestions.

title: Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare
Army Men 2
description: Army Men 2 is an action genre video game, released by 3DO to its fans in 1999. The game is a sequel to the Army Men game. Still, with the gameplay quite similar to its predecessor, Army Men 2 was slightly modified by the battle scene to help it become more realistic. The game begins in a small kitchen space, with a team of plastic soldiers. After a long struggle, the group of soldiers found a way to help them move into the plastic world. The game then changes its setting to forest, battle, etc. in the plastic world. With quite funny and unique gameplay, Army Men 2 will be a good entertainment game, helping players clear up after school and work effectively.

title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
description: Atlantis – The Lost Empire is an RPG adventure game. Although only built on the 2D platform with images is quite simple but still can not deny their vividness. Sound is also a good point in this version thanks to the extremely successful recordings of the cast iron voice actors. Entering each level, the character will be provided with a copy that leads to the location of the treasure. In order to quickly find the treasure, the character can interact with the professors he meets on the way. Your character will be able to move quickly while jumping, also the strong points of the player. After finding the treasure, the eagle seeks consciousness inherent to the player. Successfully answering a puzzle, the treasure will belong to you, and the new map will also be unlocked.

title: Austin Powers – Oh, Behave!
description: Austin Powers – Oh, Behave! is an action game developed by Tarantula Studio and released to fans in 2000. Eye-catching graphics with well-designed, vivid and sharp graphics, along with the extremely lively, suitable sound for the in-game segments is a great point for this version. The game will only allow you to fight individually with lots of mini-games like “International Man in a Platform Game”, “Mojo Maze,” “Domination.” “International Man in a Platform Game” is the mini-game that attracts the most players. Transform into Austin Power, you will be involved and the action-adventure takes place as a movie. In addition, during the adventure of obstacles, enemies may appear to make the game difficult. Domination is the simplest part of playing just asking your character to guess and flip the opponent’s chips. If the guess hits the color, the chip will be yours.

title: Austin Powers – Welcome To My Underground Lair!
description: “Austin Powers – Welcome To My Underground Lair!” is a platform-based video game, released by the publisher “RockStar Game” in 2000. The game was inspired by the developer “Austin Powers. Austin Powers – Welcome To My Underground Lair”. ! ” There is a plot revolving around Dr. Evil, the villain of the movie Austin Powers. The game has many mini-games, including Mojo Maze, Pac-man, Domination, RockStar Paper Scissors, and Kin-evil. Come to “Austin Powers – Welcome To My Underground Lair !” the player will first choose the background image, the interface for the game during the experience to their liking. In addition to the single-player mode, the game supports multiple players connected to each other via the internet. During gameplay, there will sometimes be a video cut from the original movie to guide the game’s story. With quite good graphics and great sound, “Austin Powers – Welcome To My Underground Lair!” Definitely, a good game for players to be entertained after hours of study and stressful work.

title: Azure Dreams
description: Azure Dreams is an RPG, brought to fans by Nintendo in 1997. The game is set in the town of Monsbaiya, located in a barren desert. Although the desert town is hot and barren, it has great economic prospects because of a Monster Tower. The tower is the home of the most powerful monsters. An experienced tamer of monsters, Guy, also disappeared when he entered the tower. Guy’s son, at the age of 15, decided to take another friend to the top of the tower to save his father. Coming to Azure Dreams, players will transform into Koh (Guy’s son) and destroy all the monsters in the way while adventuring in the Monster tower. Each monster has hidden magic, so players must always pay attention to find suitable countermeasures.

title: Batman Beyond: Return Of The Joker
description: Batman Beyond – Return Of The Joker is an action game produced by Kemco and released by Ubisoft to the player for the first time in 2000. The context of the game takes place 20 years after the hero Batman retired, but evil continues in Gotham City that a new gang called Jokerz has appeared and terrorized innocent people. However, Batman suspected that their plot was not only that and returned, later, he discovered the Joker – whom Batman destroyed but still alive and is the mastermind of Jokerz. You will play as Batman and can fight with all the weapons that Batman has. The game will have all 5 stages that you must go through to get to the end. With lots of advanced weapons and equipment, please help Batman protect Gotham City.

title: Batman Of The Future – Return Of The Joker
description: Batman Of The Future – Return Of The Joker is a video game genre of Scrolling beat ’em up, brought to fans by UbiSoft in 2000. The game was inspired by the developer of the movie of the same name. Similar to the hit games of the time, such as Final Fight, coming to Batman Of The Future – Return Of The Joker, players will play the role of Batman and defeat all enemies in one-on-one confrontations. The game allows the player to choose one of the 4 available suites, and each outfit has its own special ability. The four extra pages are Standard, Offense, Defense, and Nimble. Although this feature is quite complicated for new players, once the player memorizes all the features of the costumes, BatMan will become invincible to all enemies.

title: Batman: Chaos in Gotham
description: The Batman returns on Game Boy Color with BATMAN: Total Chaos in Gotham City. Based on the popular animated BATMAN series, this single-player action game allows you to don the cowl of one of two Bat-heroes: Batman or Batgirl. Some of the Dark Knight's famous arch-villains have escaped and are causing serious trouble in Gotham, and it's up to you to put them back where they belong. Everyone from Poison Ivy to the Clown Prince of Crime the Joker himself is here to wreak havoc and keep the caped crusader busy. Grab your utility belt and assault 18 stages of varied action that take you on a tour of Gotham City. Much of the action is played from a side-scrolling perspective, but some levels have you taking out the Batmobile or the Batcycle in overhead high-speed excitement. Naturally, Batman and Batgirl are both packing their usual assortment of weapons and tools including the Batarang, the grappling hook, smoke bombs, and more.

title: Battle Tanx
description: Battle Tanx is an action game developed and released by fans in 1998. The game is the story of a gang that dropped a virus capable of killing up to 99.99% on impact. Facing with this figure, the player will transform into a hero standing up to fight with the gang and seek to destroy this virus. The game will include 17 different levels, and each level will be placed in the space of a famous city in the United States, such as New York, San Francisco, Chicago, … When starting the gameplay, your character will be equipped with a battle tank. If, during the battle, your tank is broken, the risk of loss will be very high. In addition, players can interact with the environment by destroying them to collect some necessary items.

title: Bionic Commando: Elite Forces
description: Bionic Commando – Elite Forces is a Platform game, produced and developed by Nintendo and launched in 2000. The game’s setting is in peaceful Karina but has been terrorized by a cruel name is Arcturus. He is the leader of the Avars, an evil army that has persecuted Karinia for many years. And you will play as a member of the elite forces fighting the Avars army to rescue this land, as well as saving Joe – a member of the team captured by Avars. The character you play will be an unnamed sapper, but capable of using sniper rifles, and in addition, you also have other special skills to use in serious situations. Difficult missions are waiting ahead for the player to pass.

title: Blade
description: Blade is an action game released by Hammerhead and released to fans in 2000. About the graphics in this version, though not appreciated with images that are relatively rough and have not been trained. In general, the sound design is a great point, thanks to the voiceover of professional actors. Entering the game, you will control your character to go to many locations where vampires attack to destroy them. Vampires can gather in the areas of warehouses, museums, streets, or even at nightclubs. They appear singly or in groups. To destroy them, players can use their fists or use light to shine on them (vampires are afraid of the light). Also, when the character has been increased to a certain level, you can use guns to attack them. This will help the character avoid the damage caused by vampires. However, the number of bullets is limited, so in addition to attacking them, the player must move to search and collect more ammunition for the fight. In addition, if the player has a bounty of bonuses, they can be exchanged for ammunition outside the stores before entering the match.

title: Bomberman Quest
description: Once upon a time, in a galaxy far away… Bomberman was piloting the Bomber Shuttle, carrying monsters he’d fought and captured to Planet Bomber. Suddenly, the shuttle was struck by a powerful force, and its engines were stolen! The Bomber Shuttle was forced to make an emergency crash-landing on a nearby planet, and all the monsters on board took this opportunity to escape. It was then that Bomberman discovered this was all the work of the mysterious Four Commanders! Bomberman Quest has two different mode for you to enjoy: Normal Mode, an action RPG, and Battle Mode, where you can enjoy two-player battles against your friends using a Game Link cable. Can you help Bomberman defeat the Four Commanders?

title: Bugs Bunny in Crazy Castle 4
description: Bugs Bunny returns in BUGS BUNNYS CRAZY CASTLE 4 for Game Boy Color! Thinking he has found the Carrot Castle, Bugs has once again entered the Crazy Castle. You must help him escape in this single-player action or puzzle game. This time, more than 60 rooms await Bugs, and he'll have to use all of his wits and skills to escape with his "hare" intact. Once again, the Crazy Castle is loaded with traps and hazards that will cut your carrot-collecting career short so make sure you don't get reacquainted with them the hard way. As CRAZY CASTLE fans are probably used to, several Warner Bros. cartoon characters are here to keep Bugs on his toes. You'll have to fight off Daffy Duck, Yosemite Sam, Foghorn Leghorn, Pepe Le Pew, Tweety, and the Tazmanian Devil with one of a variety of weapons, or make tracks to the nearest safe spot. A password save will chart your progress so that you don't have to start from scratch each time you play.

title: Bugs Bunny: Crazy Castle 3
description: Bugs Bunny – Crazy Castle 3 is an adventure genre game developed by Kemco and first released by Nintendo to the player in 1997. You will play the role of Bugs when he finds out. That there is a treasure but do not know its exact location. However, many things will prevent you from coming to this treasure. You will have to go through all 61 levels ranging from easy to difficult, and each level will have 8 keys to help you get closer to the treasure. Try to go through all the levels to be able to collect enough keys. With a simple play mechanism with only 4 control buttons, along with interesting game modes with funny graphic images, Bugs Bunny – Crazy Castle 3 will be a very suitable game for you to entertain.

title: Casper
description: Casper is an action-adventure genre video game, brought to fans by InterPlay Productions in 1996. The game was inspired by the developer of the movie of the same name. Coming to Casper, players will transform into a ghost named Casper. The main task of the player is to control Casper to protect Kat Harvey from all dangers. Casper can fly through walls and obstacles, but the player is not allowed to control Casper too far from Kat. If not, Carrigan’s ghost will kidnap her, and the player fails. Casper video games are closely followed by the content of the original movie, thus giving players a sense of closeness and familiarity. In the process of passing the location of the mansion, the player must collect special objects, which allow Casper to form different types of objects and protect Kat from dangers. The game also has mirrors everywhere, which will help Kat and Casper move to other locations of the villa quickly. In addition, Casper can transform into electric bolts if enough wires are collected, which is also Casper’s strongest state.

title: Catwoman
description: Catwoman is a strategy, adventure, and action game developed by Argonaut Games and released by fans in the year. The game is based on a hit movie of the same name but has been changed a bit about the situation that best suits this game series. Entering the game, you will transform into a heroine with the ability to move and attack agile. Your character will not only be able to move with his feet as usual but can use his whip to cling to walls and move. This helps the character save time to move while increasing attack speed. Your enemies can appear anywhere. Pay close attention, attack them first to give yourself an advantage. Winning each new map match will be unlocked, allowing you to join the new battle.

title: Conker’s Pocket Tales
description: Conker’s Pocket Tales is an action-adventure video game, brought to fans by Rare publisher in 1999. The game is the first version of the popular Conker series. Conker’s Pocket Tales has a plot around Conker. Conker is on his way to finding his stolen birthday present in preparation for his new girlfriend. Then rescue his girlfriend Berri was kidnapped and imprisoned by Evil Acorn. Players will travel through the nooks and crannies of the map in search of their stolen gifts. In addition to searching and collecting gifts, players can also be attacked suddenly, sometimes encounter some puzzles. Thanks to the diversity of Conker’s Pocket Tales, you will never get bored during the game. In addition, the game has quite nice graphics and stable sound, providing a relatively good experience.

title: Daffy Duck – Fowl Play
description: Daffy Duck – Fowl Play is an action genre video game brought to fans by Sunsoft in 2000. Daffy Duck – Fowl Play is an extremely popular game in Japan, extremely popular with young people. The game has a total of six levels, including the country, the lakeside; a forest; a bunch of dangerous jumps; some stinging scorpions; The last is the desert. Coming to Daffy Duck – Fowl Play, players will be transformed into Daffy. In each level, players will start with five lives. Each time a player is captured by an enemy, falls into an enemy’s trap, or the character’s energy is depleted, one life is deducted. When the player destroys an enemy, some of his / her energy may be dropped. Looting them up to restore energy for your character. During the adventure, players can collect money and a few items. Use the money to buy extra equipment as well as special items to maximize the ability to overcome the game levels.

title: Dinosaur
description: Carnivores: Dinosaur Hunter is a game released by BEATSHAPERS in 2012. Coming to the game, you will enter a world of hundreds of millions of years ago when the earth was full of scary dinosaurs. You will play the role of a hunter to explore and hunt dinosaurs, but be careful because they have the ability to hear, see, and feel very well. If not careful, you will become the prey of a hunt. There are 15 different types of dinosaurs in 5 locations with different environmental conditions, so make use of these natural features to make it easier to hunt. In addition, you will be able to choose and equip yourself with weapons, along with support from radar and maps to hunt. Along with the beautiful 3D images, it will bring a great experience for players.

title: Disney’s Tarzan
description:
Disney’s Tarzan is a game in the role-playing genre, the dynamic story of the adventure of Tarzan was released in 1999. You will play the role of Tarzan – a human but raised in the forest, so have health and extraordinary moving skills like the animals in the forest. Adventure with your green mates with jungle adventures.
Your weapon will be the fruits of the forest to confront the fierce animals in the forest, as well as the wicked hunters hunt the animals in the forest. With graphics appreciated at the time of 1999, the game will help you relive sweet childhood memories and the exciting adventures of Tarzan in the vast forests.

title: Donald Duck: Quack Attack
description: Donald Duck – Quack Attack is a role-playing game produced in 2001, adapted from the famous cartoon film of the same name. You will play the role of Donald in your favorite movie, not just Donald, but also other characters like Louie Huey, Dewey, and more. You will control your character to run through many obstacles, evade enemies who get in your way so you can save your girlfriend Daisy. You will have to go through 4 types of maps, with 20 different levels from easy to difficult, and each level is not simple to overcome. With 3D graphics that were supposed to be excellent at that time, it would give you images and effects good enough for you to experience the game in the best way.

title: Donkey Kong Country
description: Donkey Kong Country is a Platform game developed by Rare and launched in 1994. The game is the story revolving around the duo Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong. Controlling one of the two main characters, the player’s task is to retrieve and store the bananas that were stolen by King K. Rool and his minions – the Kremlings. Entering the game, you will be able to set foot in a jungle world designed with huge trees and hundreds of different animals. Driving your characters to move quickly in the forest, finding opponents and attacking them as stomping, or stoning them is your task. Each enemy will have different attack and defense skills, so players need to have reasonable tactics to defeat them and regain their bananas.

title: Donkey Kong GB – Dinky Kong & Dixie Kong
description: Donkey Kong GB – Dinky Kong & Dixie Kong is an adventure role-playing video game, brought to fans by Nintendo in 2000. The game is the 3rd version in the Donkey Kong GB game series. The game revolves around Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong, both on their way to “The Lost World.” Donkey Kong GB – Dinky Kong & Dixie Kong still have the same gameplay as the previous installments, but it has added a few new items. Players still use the A button to jump, B button to roll and grab the crate. The Select button allows the player to change the control between the characters Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong, but only the Kong that the player controls will be displayed on the screen. Due to the small screen, Donkey Kong and Diddy Kong actually bring quite an uncomfortable experience. Because when the enemy attacked Kong (not controlled by the player, so it could not be detected), the remaining Kong kept losing energy, and the game ended, if the player was not observant.

title: Dragon Ball Z – Densetsu No Chou Senshitachi
description: If you’re fed up with complex intellect or simple adventure and are looking for a more challenging action game, then Dragon Ball Z – Densetsu No Chou Senshitachi is an attractive version for you. The game has been greatly improved in terms of features and gameplay, promising to bring players the best experience. In terms of graphics, though only rated at average with images that are relatively simple and not sharp, but it still scored thanks to the harmonious color combination. There will be two game modes in this release: story mode and battle mode. In story mode, players will interact with the environment and other characters. The battle mode is where the battles will take place one after another, using his defensive offensive skills the character will quickly destroy the opponent.

title: Dragon Ball Z – Guerreros De Leyenda (S)
description: Dragon Ball Z – Guerreros De Leyenda (S) is a visual novel genre video game, first released for fans by Daisuke Nishio in 1993. Because the game is a visual novel genre, players do not have to do much but mainly follow the game and offer a few options to guide the storyline. The game has a plot revolving around the fight of the super Saiyan with Broly. Millionaire Jagger Batta has the plot to rule the world, but all are stopped by the super heroes. However, he always thought that Santa was the one who obstructed his dream. Once, Jagger Batta forced Santa to go to an island (where he raised the gene mutation creatures). But luckily for Santa, there are Trunks and Goten with him. After discovering the island, Trunks and Goten realized that Jagger Batta was able to revive even Broly – the most powerful and cruel landlord of Saiyan history.

title: Dragon Ball Z – Legendary Super Warriors
description: Dragon Ball Z – Legendary Super Warriors is an action fighting game, developed exclusively for the Boy Color game system. Entering the game, you will be taken to a vivid world with lots of highly dramatic matches. Transforming into Saga, players can use attack techniques to destroy opponents. Also, if using additional support items, the power will be greatly increased. Items can appear after the character has defeated several opponents, or purchased outside the store. There are up to 125 cards in this version, using each one will help you recreate and participate in a battle that you require. The feature allows customizing the character to make it easier for the character to change the main power in each match, whether it be moving at a faster speed, or maybe using punches with greater strength. In addition to the battle mode, players can participate and the story mode where the character will be set in a new world with quite interesting situations when interacting with other characters and surroundings. To score points in this mode, the character will have to correctly answer a few questions related to the situation in the story.

title: Dragon Ball Z: Legendary Super Warriors
description: Dragon Ball Z: Legendary Super Warriors is a mixture of a card game and a turn-based fighting game for the Game Boy Color. The game is played with original in-game cards for attacks, techniques and support items and initially has only two modes trade and story. Legendary Super Warriors’ story spans from the Saiyan saga to the end of the Buu Saga. Once beaten, a battle mode is unlocked, allowing players to square off with random enemies. Once the game is beaten, any character is usable in any battle, such as Frieza vs. Cell.

title: Dragon Quest I & II
description: Dragon Quest I & II is a relatively interesting puzzle game. The highlight of this version is the graphical enhancement with invested images that are extremely sharp and vivid, and the colors are harmoniously combined. Initially, the character will be provided with a map available. When moving across the map, the character will encounter enemies and be forced to fight and defeat them. If falling into the dungeon, the character will have to fight bosses quite hard. However, if you win them, your gold and experience points will be increased. The more battles you win, the more new maps are unlocked. Search for all the character puzzle pieces so that new characters could be unlocked to allow players to control freely.

title: Dragon Quest Monsters
description: Dragon Quest Monsters is a mobile game developed by the famous manufacturer Square Enix and released by Garena, which was brought to players in 2015. Bringing an adventure role-playing style combining tactics with turn-based attack play, the game becomes extremely attractive. You will play a character on a deserted island, fight monsters, then tame and recruit monsters into your team. You will join your army in overcoming difficulties, and each monster has special characteristics and combat skills. Learn the monsters you have to suit your squad best and don’t forget to upgrade your equipment to a level that will increase your strength. Exciting matches are waiting for you ahead.

title: Dragon Quest Monsters – Terry No Wonderland (V1.1)
description: Dragon Quest Monsters – Terry No Wonderland (V1.1) is an RPG developed by Square Enix and was brought to the audience in 2003. You will play your character with the first perspective and fight together against monsters. But to defeat monsters in this game is not easy, because they can also learn magic and skills. And after defeating a monster, you can recruit them into your team and fight in the next match. Each monster also has different characteristics that you need to know when managing them. As each monster will have a different wild index, monsters with a high wild level will rarely obey your commands. Interesting features and other attractive gameplay mechanics are waiting for players ahead.

title: Dragon Warrior I & II
description: Dragon Warrior I & II is an RPG, brought to fans by Enix in 1993. The game lad is a remake of the famous game Dragon Quest. Compared to its predecessor, Dragon Warrior I & II is very much favored by developers in the gameplay and new features. Now, when players buy armor and weapons in the store, they will automatically wear on the character. The fog effect is added to some new maps like dungeons and towns. The character has more resilience, and the level of experience required of the character is also greatly reduced. The life points of boss monsters (which appear at the end of the levels) are increased by 700%, making it extremely difficult to overcome the level.

title: Dragon Warrior III
description: Dragon Warrior III is a role-playing video the game, brought to fans by Enix in 1996. The game is the third installment in the Dragon Warrior game series. Although the gameplay has not changed, the developer has significantly expanded the feature and the new map in this 3rd version. In addition, the game is also modified in terms of interface, providing a smoother experience than the previous two versions. Dragon Warrior III still uses the gameplay of a basic role-playing game. The main features still revolve around leveling up by gaining experience points, collecting and upgrading new equipment. The game owns a system of characters from many different classes. At the beginning of the game, the player is allowed to create characters according to the available characteristics such as gender, place of birth, … Then, select the class for the character. The game has 7 layers for the player to choose, including warriors, pilgrims, wizards, sellers, Goof-Off, sage, and finally, Thief. Each class has a system of tactics, different fighting styles.

title: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2: Cobi’s Journey
description: Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 – Cobi’s Journey is an immersive genre video game, brought to fans by Enix in 2001. The game is the second version of the Dragon Warrior Monsters game series. Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 – Cobi’s Journey has a gameplay that’s not much different from its predecessor, but the developer has added a few new features instead. In this version, the game also adds a new monster family called Water. Dragon Warrior Monsters 2 – Cobi’s Journey allows players to form a group of monsters from different Dragon Quest games, not just in the main game mode as previous versions. Players will have the option to control Cobi or Tara. The game has many different areas, each with a different function.

title: Driver – You Are The Wheelman
description: Driver – You Are The Wheelman is a racing game developed by Reflections Interactive and was released by GT Interactive Software on the PlayStation platform in 1999. With beautiful 3D graphics, it was released in the late 20th century. The game will bring you the main race on the roads in the city. You will have to control your car through the times. In addition, you must avoid other cars on the road, and have to run away from the pursuit of the police anymore. The control mechanism of the game is also very simple, so you can easily get used to the game. In addition to playing directly with other opponents, there is a time race mode, so you have more options when playing the game.

title: Driver: You Are The Wheelman
description: In Driver, you are the wheelman in a series of Hollywood-style car-chases. A great getaway driver is only as good as his equipment, which is why Driver has a selection of performance-packed muscle cars, complete with realistic handling, damage modeling, and real-world physics reactions. Driver also comes fully equipped with a replay/director mode that gives you all the necessary tools to “film” their own car chase and multiple views that allow you to look around when you’re driving. Put the pedal to the metal and be the best driver around.

title: Duke Nukem
description: Duke Nukem is a hunting video game brought to fans by Apogee Software Ltd (now 3D Realms) in 1999. The game is also the first version in the Duke Nuke game series. The game has a plot revolving around Duke Nukem, during his travels to World War II. Here, Duke Nukem joins his army of troops to defeat the Nazis and aliens. The content of the game, apart from the original movie of the same name, Duke Nukem also received the contributions of the comics Balls Of Steel and Glorious Bastard. Although later, the first version of the series was dropped by the developer, it contributed a big step in the success of the Duke Nukem game series later. Although it is impossible to find Duke Nukem in an orthodox way, Internet versions are still stored, which players can download and experience.

title: Earthworm Jim – Menace 2 The Galaxy
description: Earthworm Jim – Menace 2 The Galaxy is a platformer in the series of famous Earthworm Jim games, which was launched in November 1999. The game was built with the highly appreciated gameplay combined with Beautiful graphics, built on the 2D side-scrolling platform. Controlling the Evil Jin character, the player will steal a time-traveling device, traveling back to the past to prevent the evil plot of his evil twin. Elements were also added in this release, increasing the level of drama and challenge for the game. Firearms such as plasma guns, grenade launchers, or rifles will be equipped when entering the game. In order to upgrade the guns, Jim needs to collect more precious gems. However, the game will be more focused on the tasks required to collect items. Completing each level, characters will be added 100 points to experience points.

title: Elevator Action EX
description: Elevator Action EX is an action platform game developed by Altron and Taito. The game was released to players in 2000. Coming to the game, you will have three main characters, Mike, Guy, and Sarah. Each character has its own advantages and disadvantages, Mike is big and strong, Guy is tough but slow, and Sarah is an agile but weaker girl. Utilize the skills of the character to complete the mission. The game will be divided into four stages, and each stage has four different levels. In the first three levels, you will have to fight soldiers with very large numbers. If you pass to the last level, you will have to face the final Boss. The difficult levels with exciting action scenes are waiting for players to experience.

title: F-1 World Grand Prix
description: F-1 World Grand Prix straps you into the driver's seat as you experience the high-octane rush of an actual Formula One season. Compete in the FIA Formula One World Championship with your choice of 22 drivers. You'll race through 17 of the most challenging Formula One circuits. Five game modes including: Grand Prix, Exhibition, Time Trial, Challenge and Two-Player. Realistic racing effects include real-time tire wear, skid marks and exhaust flames.

title: FIFA 2000
description: FIFA 2000 is a soccer simulation genre game, brought to fans by EA Sports in 2000. The game allows players to control and play with more than 40 teams around the world. In addition, FIFA 2000 allows players to classify these teams according to their strength, specific technique, … Through training mode, you can learn the different skills of playing football. With a beautiful interface, all the tools in Fifa 2000 have been optimized to facilitate the process of joining the experience. A lot of new applications and interactions are included in the game. For example, the camera function will allow players to observe matches in many different angles. A lot of customization for players to choose from shirt colors, weather, stadiums, or if they like, they can create a player named after themselves and compete with the football star. In addition, the game is also favored by the developer to add a real-world effect in the game that will make players feel like they are participating in a real match.

title: Frogger
description: Frogger is an extremely exciting action-adventure game. Entering the game, you will transform into a frog, with the task of quickly finding your way home in the shortest time. To complete his mission, the character will have to cross a road and a very dangerous river. Initially, players will control a group of 3, 5 or 7 frogs (depending on the difficulty level games). Finish the game screen only need at least 1 frog to the destination to be able to win. On the road, there will be lots of cars, trucks, and bulldozers running through your task is to guide your frog quickly across the road without an accident. Crossing the road full of transports, frogs will come to a river full of dangers like crocodiles, … To move through here, characters need to jump on logs, turtle backs quickly, avoid falling into the river.

title: Frogger 2
description: Frogger 2 is an action-adventure game developed by Blitz Games and released to fans in 1997. The game was built with 4-way gameplay in the 3D world, designed extremely vividly with hundred different species of plants and animals. Compared to its predecessor, the first difference that needs to be mentioned is that the number of characters has increased significantly, allowing you to choose freely. Controlling a frog, in turn, pass the level is your task. The complexity of the environment fish has been increased, creating more challenges for players. At the same time, this will also require players to learn and explore more to understand each environment. Gold coins will also appear randomly along the way, so be aware of collecting more!

title: From TV Animation One Piece – Maboroshi No Grand Line Boukenki!
description: From TV Animation One Piece – Maboroshi No Grand Line Boukenki! is a role-playing action game. The game will be a story revolving around a group of brave friends determined to stand up against the dark forces planning to invade their planet. Transformed into a hero, the player will fight against the malformed monsters with his friends. In each level, your enemy will have a different shape, maybe a purple squid, a yellow seahorse, … In battles, the strategy will be applied one by one immediately is that one attack after the other team can attack. Each character will have 1 HP (blood gauge), and if anyone’s HP becomes 0 first, that person will lose. Moving around the map will help you meet many monsters and quickly level up.

title: Game & Watch Gallery 2
description: This game provides modern versions of retro games by bringing them with color. The collection includes five original titles, so you can find their remixed versions and Mario characters. In addition, players can catch falling items or dodge objects to complete missions. They must cook food in Chef or hit enemies in another gameplay. Therefore, the final goal is to earn stars when they reach high scores. This resource can help you unlock new content and find fresh experiences. The modern versions have Mario characters, while the classic ones have Mario characters that keep the original style. Over time, the game tracks scores in various difficulty modes so players can challenge themselves.

title: Game & Watch Gallery 3
description: This handheld game brings classic and updated versions, so players can enjoy simple games with new content. Therefore, you can find interesting characters that can switch between styles. The first game requires you to walk across bridges when carrying items. You try to avoid falling down and overcome many challenges. In addition, another game focuses on catching eggs that can be cooked properly with the timing requirements. Players also defend plants against insects or become young heroes. Therefore, you can find a fresh experience besides original artwork or updated Nintendo characters. Players can unlock bonuses and rewards when they achieve high scores. You can not ignore the practice that leads to mastery.

title: Ghosts ‘N Goblins
description: Ghosts ‘N Goblins is a running and shooting video game released by Capcom. The game is the first version of the game series Ghosts. The Ghosts series focuses mainly on the duties of knight Arthur. During the journey, he saves Princess Prin-Prin from the evil king Astaroth. The main task of the player in the levels is to defeat the zombies in the way. Every time you kill a zombie, the player will gain a little experience. The higher the character’s level, the higher their attack stat and armor. But also another way to help increase Arthur’s strength is that players collect equipment for better quality. Those suits and weapons can be found in the chests obtained after each level. But no matter how strong Arthur’s armor was, the demon king Astaroth needed only one blow to break it.

title: Godzilla – The Series – Monster Wars
description: Godzilla – The Series – Monster Wars is a shooting genre video game brought to fans by Crawfish Interactive in 2000. The game has a fairly independent storyline, not related to any documents. The game takes place in the 2000s, the year Godzilla wakes up after millions of years of sleep in the deep sea. The aliens see the power of Godzilla is too terrorist, and they are worried that humans can not fight back, so they created mutants with extraordinary power on Earth with the desire to balance Godzilla’s power. Coming to Godzilla – The Series – Monster Wars, players will control a giant lizard and attack the enemy with special attacks of Godzilla such as shooting fireballs, biting, stomping, or breathing fire. The game has ten action levels, taking place in many locations such as desert, underwater, or in the city. Although there is quite a new story and gameplay, Godzilla – The Series – Monster Wars graphics and sound are not really good.

title: Grand Theft Auto
description: Grand Theft Auto is an action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North. The game scored thanks to the detailed, beautifully designed investment images. Combined with that is the lively soundtrack voiced by famous actors. The music also becomes more logical and suitable for each situation in the game. Instead of transforming into the righteous characters like other games, in this version, you will control one of the three criminals who plan to attack and overthrow the government and the forces that stand in your way of ruling the country. The game will revolve around the tasks of robbery, fighting, upsetting people’s order of life, and not forgetting the main task – seeking to overthrow his government. Depending on the severity of the task, the number of police officers will be changed accordingly.

title: Grand Theft Auto 2
description: Grand Theft Auto 2 is an action-adventure video game, brought to fans by Rockstar Games in 1999. The game is the second version of the hit game series Grand Theft Auto and is the sequel to the game Grand Theft Auto. In this version, the developer has set up the game for an open design, meaning that players can freely roam around the city of AnyWhere (the main context of the game). Grand Theft Auto 2 has a top-down perspective, and players can ride a car, motorbike, or even walk to explore the city. The main goal is to achieve a certain number of points set by the game screen. The game has a quite unique mission system. Although completing it means you will get more points, the truth is that it is not required. You can finish the game without doing any task, and only time will be longer. This version also added features “gang” with extremely interesting mechanisms.

title: Hamtaro: Ham Hams Unite!
description: Hamtaro – Ham-Hams Unite! It is an adventure game developed by Pax Softnice and was first released by Nintendo to the player in 2001. You will play the main character, a hamster named Hamtaro, and Your task is to find other members of the club. You will have to learn the words in the Hamchat dictionary – a language of hamsters. The boss will be the one who assigns you the task and will also teach you the most basic Hamchat words. Your search for other characters is also not easy when you have to overcome puzzles and have to placate other ferocious hamsters. In addition, when you need to buy clothes or any item, you will be able to use sunflower seeds as currency.

title: Harry Potter And The Chamber Of Secrets
description: If you are a fan of the famous Harry Potter series, becoming Harry using his magic to protect the right means is your dream, then Harry Potter And The Chamber Of Secrets will surely be An interesting experience that you cannot ignore. The game will be built based on the situations in the story. However, some episodes will be adapted to fit a real action-adventure game. Entering the game, you will control his friend Harry to explore the castles and the Hogwarts base through the assigned tasks. During the course of the game, Harry will learn many new spells to enhance his fighting strength. At the same time, don’t forget to make new friends gain more clues about the enemies!

title: Harry Potter And The Sorcerer’s Stone (M13)
description: Harry Potter And The Sorcerer’s Stone (M13) is an action-adventure video game, brought to fans by Electronic Arts in 2001. The game was inspired by the legendary novel series of the same name. The game revolves around the character of Harry Potter, a normal teenager. It was not until the age of eleven that Harry learned that he was a warlock. In the same year, he enrolled at the magic school and the Hogwarts magician. Here, Harry Potter befriends other wizards, receives magical training, and joins a group of close friends against Lord Voldemort, preventing him from regaining authority. The game is approached from a third perspective. Players will play the role of Harry Potter and participate in the top magic war. But in the beginning, the player could not use the magic, but all had to be learned gradually through the missions of the game. Players will be able to use the following six types of special magic: Flipendo Jinx, Alohomora, Wingardium Leviosa, Lumos, and Incendio. And the other moves are a combination of these 6 types of basic magic.

title: Harvest Moon 2 GBC
description: Harvest Moon 2 GBC is a simulation video game, brought to fans by JP publisher in 1999. The game is the second version of the Harvest Moon game series. Although the gameplay of Harvest Moon 2 GBC is still similar to previous versions, the game also has some minor improvements. Players can now build sheep farms, buy and raise them. The main objective of the game is for three years, players must maintain the farm by growing vegetables and raising animals. Every year, the mayor of the city will check the farm. If the farm grows well, the player can continue the job. The crop in Harvest Moon 2 GBC is the player’s main source of income. After planting, players must take care of them daily carefully to achieve the highest revenue.

title: Harvest Moon 3 GBC
description: If becoming a farm owner is your dream, being in nature is your dream, then Harvest Moon 3 GBC is the perfect game for you. A farm simulation game developed by Victor Interactive Software and launched in 2000 with many outstanding features in terms of gameplay and graphics, the game promises to bring you an incredibly awesome experience. Initially, players will be able to choose the gender for their character. Throughout the game, your main task is to fulfill the desire to build a development farm of your late father. Set in an island or mountainous region, the character will live in a small village with an empty plot of land. You will plant trees and raise animals to build your own farm.

title: Harvest Moon GB
description: Harvest Moon GB is a role-playing video game that combines life simulation, brought to fans by Victor Interactive Software in 2013. The game is the first version of the Harvest Moon game series. Initially, the player can choose a character as a boy or girl, and then give his / her a name. The character (created by the player) is having a meeting with the deceased grandfather (present as a spirit) and requires the player to take over his farm. After that, the player will become a genuine farmer, the grandfather’s soul will return to the test house at the beginning of every winter to check the player’s progress. If he sees that the barracks are not growing well, he will not let the player use the farm anymore, and the game is over. Players will grow and sell agricultural products to earn money. Use the money earned to expand the farm and buy new types of animals.
publisher: JP: Victor Interactive Software/ NA: Natsume/ EU: Nintendo

title: Heroes Of Might And Magic II
description: Heroes Of Might And Magic II is a strategy game in the cult series Heroes Of Might And Magic. This version will add two new factions, the necromancer and the Wizard. Individual skills for each superhero are also added. Each hero will have up to 8 extra skills in addition to the 14 skills available as in previous versions. At the same time, each character will also have 3 different battle levels. Collect enough experience points will be level up. In addition to fighting, your character can collect some sold items to earn an additional amount to upgrade equipment. The graphics in this version are only designed in 2D, but the images are very eye-catching, combined with the harmonious colors to create a good point.

title: Heroes of Might and Magic
description: Travel to a world of wizards, knights, dragons, and minotaurs in HEROES OF MIGHT AND MAGIC. You can choose from four different heroes and take control of part of a map. The goal is to defeat the other three warlords and rule the entire map. In order to do this, you must travel throughout the land, finding new areas and new towns. If you can get a town to help you, you can recruit new warriors and uncover information to find artifacts that will increase your powers and abilities. When you encounter the enemy, the armies square off in tactical combat where you can try to cut down the opposition with ranged attacks or cause status problems with magic spells. Destroy the opposition and rule the world in HEROES OF MIGHT AND MAGIC.

title: Hugo: Black Diamond Fever
description: Hugo – Black Diamond Fever is a platform game developed by ITE Media and published by Electronic Arts for PC and PlayStation in 2001. Scylla-witch is an archenemy of the enemy with protagonist Hugo enslaving innocent people, searching for black diamonds, to create medicine that turns her into the most powerful witch of all time to take over the world. You will play the intelligent and agile Hugo. Hugo is tasked with rescuing the prisoners and stopping the evil witch’s intentions. With the 2D platform, the game will bring good graphics to the player. You will have to fight the tough challenges alone, so be careful because the number of your lives is also limited, if all you will have to return.

title: Hunter X Hunter – Kindan No Hihou
Jungle Book, The – Mowgli’s Wild Adventure
description: If you are a nature lover or immerse yourself in them is your dream for so long, then Jungle Book, The – Mowgli’s Wild Adventure is a game made for you. The plot is based on the hit cartoon of the same name. Entering the game, you will set foot in a jungle world built on 3D with lots of different beautifully designed animals. Transforming into a boy who dreams of becoming a “jungle prince,” players will participate in training courses on special techniques. Thanks to the help of the animals in the forest, through each level, the character will learn a skill such as flowing, jumping, climbing, crawling, for example. Finish each level is a test of your level. In addition, there will be many dangerous predators in the forest. To protect the animals, players need to throw objects such as bananas or coconuts to damage them.

title: Keitai Denjuu Telefang: Power Version
description: Telefang is a monster-collecting RPG with monsters known as Denjuu that live in a world called the Denjuu World. These Denjuu have cellphones called D-Shots and they battle each other. They can befriend T-Fangers, people who specialize in handling and befriending Denjuu and having them battle other Denjuu. Shigeki, the protagonist, a T-Fanger. When arriving to the Denjuu World, Shigeki is determined to befriend Denjuu to solve the various problems in the Denjuu World that crop up from time to time. Shigeki starts with the Denjuu Crypto, and from there, befriends and battles other Denjuu. In a battle, a T-Fanger can have from one to three Denjuu to battle. They bring Denjuu by calling them. A T-Fanger will always have one Denjuu with them, but the other two have to be called in order to have them battle. The better the coverage on the T-Fanger’s D-Shot, the more Denjuu they can use in battle. Also, depending on the T-Fanger’s location, some Denjuu will be close by, but others will be so far away that they may take multiple turns to arrive. This can serve an important role in deciding which Denjuu to pick, and can be a tough decision to make when stronger Denjuu live farther away than weaker Denjuu. Also, Shigeki can see the opponent’s Denjuu ahead of time, which can affect his decision on which Denjuu to use. Each Denjuu has a certain habitat type (out of 6), which affects the damage done to other Denjuu. All of a Denjuu’s moves are the same as their type. Depending on the matchup against another Denjuu, a Denjuu’s attacks can do either greater damage than usual, or less damage than usual. The type matchups are a 6-way rock-paper-scissors chain: Forest Aquatic Desert Grassland Mountain Sky Forest. Due to the nature of 3-on-3 battles, a Denjuu can have a type that covers the weaknesses of a teammate’s Denjuu, making some battles interesting. Each Denjuu has a moveset from 2-4 moves, which expands as the Denjuu levels up. While the moves are fixed, they often change (and typically get more powerful) when they evolve. Each move can do various things, such as deal damage, raise a stat, inflict status conditions, heal, and so on. Also, the fourth move is always a Denma Attack — this is a powerful move, and runs off the attacker’s Denma Attack stat and the opponent’s Denma Defense stat. However, the tradeoff is that takes many turns to charge up, which can mean that the Denjuu may be defeated before it gets fully charged. Also, it can miss, so when it does, there are many turns wasted. Finally, there are moves that some Denjuu have that evade attacks, including Denma Attacks, which can also mean many turns wasted. This adds strategy in whether Denma Attacks are good to use or not. Each Denjuu can evolve in different ways, with complex evolution chains. The most common method is natural evolution, which takes place when a Denjuu reaches a certain level. This takes longer than the other two methods, but is usually the best stat-wise. Another method is fusion evolution, a method that fuses Denjuu with manmade items. While many Denjuu can evolve with this method (and in fact, some Denjuu can only evolve this way), and it is the quickest method, it is generally the worst stat-wise. The last method is lab evolution. These Denjuu evolve from DNA samples from a specific set of Denjuu, and often Denjuu that evolve with this method don’t evolve naturally. It tends to be better stat-wise than fusion evolution. Outside of battles and Denjuu, each area has some problem that has to be solved, such as by beating certain bosses along the way. Some areas involve talking to other people and Denjuu, while others have complex and long mazes that must be navigated.

title: Koro Koro Kirby
description: Koro Koro Kirby is a video game of action-puzzle videos, brought to fans by Nintendo in 2000. The game revolves around Kirby, a smart and agile guy. One day, while taking a nap in a cloud, he saw a dwarf horse Dee passing by. On Dee’s back was carrying a star like a balloon. Then he saw King Dedede following behind carrying a long bumper. Doubting the king’s intention, Kirir secretly spied on the two, determined to learn the king’s plot. Soon after, Kirby learned that Dream Land lost a star, and the king was on his way to find it. The main goal of the game is to use physical laws to get Kirby to the finish line. To complete the screen, players only need to collect just enough game points given.

title: Legend Of Zelda, The – Oracle Of Ages
description: Legend Of Zelda, The – Oracle Of Ages is an action-adventure game in the Legend of Zelda series, developed by Flagship and launched in 2001. Entering the game, you will Link controls the old character – Link, but the storyline has completely changed when the main task of the character has now become the rescue of a princess from the clutches of a devil. The adventure will begin after Link wakes up in a forest in Labrynna. Upon receiving the king’s order, you move to a castle that is supposed to be where the princess is locked. To save the princess, your character will have to fight and win the boss. However, to meet the last Boss, players will have to fight with many of their minions through small levels.

title: Legend Of Zelda, The – Oracle Of Seasons
description: Legend Of Zelda, The – Oracle Of Seasons is a version of the Legend Of Zelda series of action-adventure games developed by Flagship and launched in 2001. Thanks to the lessons learned experimental draws from its predecessors, this version seems to be complete. Combined with that, a lot of new unique features have been added, promising to bring players a lot of interesting experiences. Entering the game, you will be set to the fictional land of Holodrum – where the battle is taking place. Controlling the Link character, the player will be allowed to choose one faction to join the fight. Unlike other versions of the same genre, players will fight in a top-down perspective instead of the first or third view. Initially, the Link will be equipped with a sword. After upgrading your character, you can use some special powers to attack enemies instead of just words. Using some items such as bombs, mines, … will help players not have to spend much effort but can still quickly destroy a large number of opponents.

title: Legend of Zelda, The – Link’s Awakening DX
description: Legend Of Zelda, The – Link’s Awakening DX is an action-adventure game developed and released for fans in 1993. Although it’s just an old game, with its new look, the version absolutely can conquer all the most demanding gamers. Entering the game, you will control the character Link to join an exciting adventure in the mysterious island of Koholint. Arriving in a new land, all your missions will be guided by an owl. The island that the character needs to explore will have many underground paths and dungeons. However, do not be afraid to get lost, as players will be equipped with a map that allows displaying the location of places to be explored. Your character will be provided with up to 8 types of magic weapons, making it easy to kill the opponent.

title: Legend of the River King GBC
description: Your sister is ill and you must find the Guardian Fish to save her in LEGEND OF THE RIVER KING. Travel throughout the world and blaze trails to find the best fishing holes. Be careful though, because you might have to fight wild animals with your bare hands. You can catch fish with either bait or lures, each with relative strengths and weaknesses. After catching a small one, keep it stress-free in an aquarium and watch it grow. Hopefully, you will be able to find the Guardian Fish and save your sister in LEGEND OF THE RIVER KING.

title: Lion King, The – Simba’s Mighty Adventure
description: Lion King, The – Simba’s Mighty Adventure is an action video game, brought to fans by Activision in 2000. The game was inspired by the Simba character in the movie The Lion King. Unlike previous versions, Lion King, The – Simba’s Mighty Adventure, strictly adheres to the plot of The Lion King II: Simba’s Pride. Simba will have to fight his evil uncle Scar, then rescue his daughter Kiara and fight Zira. All actions of Simba are developed and upgraded by the ferry, making every action, growl, walk, roll, roll, etc. of them be reproduced exactly as in the original. With impressive graphics and realistic sound, The Lion King II: Simba’s Pride will definitely be a good choice for those who love the action genre but do not want to be exposed but gore.
publisher: Disney Interactive Studios/ Activision Blizzard/ Activision

title: Looney Tunes
description: Looney Tunes is an RPG game released by Scopely on most operating systems in 2018. You will immersive and build the city for Looney Tunes on your own. You will collect your favorite characters and discover the fun and interesting fighting skills of the characters you have. You can also upgrade and give your character new skills or equipment to become stronger. Before each match, arrange the appropriate squad to have an advantage when facing the opposing team. The game plays in turn, so use the character very accurately with each squad to bring the best results. The graphics and images of the game are also great with beautiful 3D images, vivid colors that bring the best gaming experience.

title: Lucky Luke
description: Hey! COWBOY! How'd you like a crazy chase through the Old West? Yep, Dalton and his brothers are on the run … and we count on you to catch them. Mississippi, Colorado, your ride will not be easy:  Trigger happy Desperados, Indians on the war-path and rampaging herds of bison may send you six feet under. You must shoot faster than your own, be more cunning than a sioux and be as agile as a puma.

title: Lufia: The Legend Returns
description: Lufia – The Legend Returns is a role-playing action game combined with tactical elements in the hit series of the same name. Using the “IP system” makes it easy for characters to use their special skills and forte. Finding the full number of ancient documents required in each map will be your main task throughout the game. For the most part, to get the ancient texts, the character will have to fight enemies from the Red Slimes (inferior sea creatures) to the evil gods. It is important to strategize, layout the battle because the people standing above will take more damage than those behinds, but no matter where you stand, the ability to attack opponents will be the same. Each character will own an HP bar (measure the amount of blood). If this bar returns to 0, the character will lose their life.
publisher: JP: Taito/ NA: Natsume/ EU: Ubi Soft

title: Magical Tetris Challenge
description: Join Disney's Mickey, Minnie, Donald and Goofy as they embark on a non-stop adventure full of challenging fun and excitement in Magical Tetris Challenge. Completely addictive, deceptively simple, you'll go wild in a kaleidoscopic shower of falling Tetris pieces in this magical version of the world's most popular video game.

title: Mario Golf
description: Mario Golf is a sports game loved by many players thanks to the development of Camelot Software Planning and released in 1999. Entering the game, you will control the character Mario with the task of destroying all both enemies by winning golf matches. The gameplay will remain the same as games in the same line by allowing the player to play golf to accumulate experience points and level up the character. In practice mode, you will complete single tasks that require the completion of a certain golf technique. To increase the difficulty, players switch to the competition mode – where the character can compete with other talented players. The first version of the game field in each match will be relatively the same, only slightly different in position on golf.

title: Mario Tennis
description: Mario Tennis is a sports simulation video game, brought to fans by Nintendo in 2000. This game is the first version of the Mario-starring tennis genre. Mario Tennis owns eleven characters, including the old ones from previous versions. Newly added characters are Waluigi, Princess Daisy, Wario, Shy Guy, Donkey Kong, and Birdo. Initially, the player will choose one of the game characters given to experience. The game used the same control system with most other tennis games of the time. The strokes will be done by holding down to hold the force, then release to swing the racquet. When you press a button twice, the shot will reach full force, plus a little extra spin. But players should not use this feature much because it is not always good to hit the maximum force. The game is quite simple and easy to reach, but to reach a high level is difficult. If exposed to Mario Tennis long enough, players can develop their own strategies.

title: Mario Tennis GB
description: Mario Tennis GB is a sports simulation video game, brought to fans by Nintendo in 2000. The game was the first tennis game featuring Mario, produced by the developer Camelot Software Planning. Mario Tennis GB was added by the developer with a completely new control system, unlike any other Tennis game available on the market. Players will control Mario to perform a shot by pressing one or both of the main buttons (A and B). Before that, remember to adjust the racket so that the ball moves in the desired direction. Players can also combine two buttons at the same time in many different styles to make the shot more dangerous. For example, pressing two buttons A and B at the same time will make the ball hit very hard but difficult to control the direction of flight; pressing a button twice will cause the ball to swirl.

title: Medarot 3: Kuwagata Version
description: The third game in the Medarot/Medabots series follows more of Ikki Tenryou’s adventures. It also introduces Medachange, which allows players to transform their Medarots during battle.

title: Mega Man Xtreme
description: Mega Man Xtreme is a video game in a series of extremely popular electronic games Mega Man X. The game scores points in the eyes of players thanks to its flexible, fast-paced gameplay, combined with beautiful graphics. The lively sound helps push up the dramatic level in the game. The game is set in the 22nd century after a group of “shadow hunters” has invaded the world computer system. Computer viruses gradually invade and destroy many important systems of countries. Faced with this situation, players will transform into Mega Man X with the task of going into virtual space to completely restore computer systems. Your character will be able to run, jump, and climb walls quickly to distract enemies (viruses). There will be many stages in each level, winning all the soldiers who invade the central position, the character will encounter tough bosses. To win them, players need to retrofit different weapons with rewards (winning in previous matches) or buy with the money in the store. Characters will own a life bar. If it returns to zero before the opponent, you will lose.

title: Mega Man Xtreme 2
description: Mega Man Xtreme 2 is the next version in the series of action games, platform Mega Man X. The game is set in the 22nd century in 21XX, where people are living with robots. The intelligence of robots is increasing. They stole the human DNA to plot to destroy humans taking over the planet. Faced with this situation, players will transform into X or Zero to stand up to their evil conspiracy. Throughout the character’s quest game, one after another will appear, requiring you to destroy certain enemies successfully. A new technology has been added that allows players to attack at a distance with many advanced modern weapons such as laser guns, ballistic missiles, … In addition, using mines will help personnel objects save power but still kill many opponents.

title: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible II
description: The king of Magoku (Demon Country) is concerned. Only one baby has been born in the kingdom that night. According to ancient prophecies, it is the sign of a revival of a godly power called Gryas… Fast-forward fifteen years. You are Yuri, a young student of powers of Gaia. The king of Magoku has sent his servants to recruit people to face the upcoming revival of Gryas and to destroy him. Yuri and his friends decide to join the recruits, without knowing what this adventure will bring… Unlike most Megaten games, Last Bible II is set in a fantasy world, on a planet Gaia with a medieval culture. You can recruit demons you encounter in random battles and then summon them to fight for you. The moon phase influences the conversations with the demons, and you have to choose the correct answers to their questions in order to recruit them.

title: Metal Gear Solid
description:
Early 21st Century. An incident that rocks the US Government takes place. The classified weapon and nuclear-launching bipedal tank Metal Gear has fallen into the hands of terrorists. Seven years after the fiasco at Outer Heaven involving the original Metal Gear, the US Government calls in Solid Snake to neutralize the terrorist threat. You must use stealth tactics and undercover espionage to defeat the hostile empire. The fate of the World lies in your hands…

Go undercover as the legendary Solid Snake as you infiltrate the GLF terrorist organization and regain control of Metal Gear.

Embark on a highly classified mission containing 50+ stages of espionage action and suspense.

Hone your skills and prepare yourself for the unknown with over 180 different VR Training missions.

Challenge your friends to an intense round of hide-and-seek Metal Gear-style in the all new VS Battle mode. (Game Link cable required)

Build up an arsenal of weaponry to help you out the hostile terrorists.

title: Mickey’s Racing Adventure
description: If you’re a speed enthusiast and want to take part in dramatic racing games, then Mickey’s Racing Adventure is the perfect version for you. As a racing-style game combined with adventure elements, the game promises to bring you great moments of relaxation. The gameplay remains the same as in other games in the same line when players will be able to control their supercars to complete the race in the shortest time possible. The first to reach the finish line will be the winner. If the vehicle flips in the middle of the road, the riders will have to return to the starting line. However, the difference in this version is that the character you play will not be a boy or a girl, but a Mickey Mouse.

title: Monopoly
description: Monopoly, also known as the billionaire chess, is a board game that is published by Parker Brothers and Waddingtons. This is a game that can be played by quite a few people together. Players compete with each other to compete for assets through activities of trading or leasing with transactions using the in-game currency. To move around the board, you will use a dice, and in turn, roll the dice one by one to move the boxes corresponding to the number on the dice. Monopoly has been a very popular game all over the world, with the number of players estimated at almost 1 billion people already playing. Monopoly will be very suitable for you to play with friends and can show your economic ability in this game.

title: Monster Rancher Battle Card GB
description: Monster Rancher Battle Card GB is the first version of the popular Monster Rancher Battle strategy game developed by Tecmo and released to fans in 2000. It was only the first version, but the game was completely scoring points in the eyes of gamers, thanks to the beautifully designed graphics, meticulously detailed to each small point. To have a chance to fight with rivals, your character needs to own a certain number of cards. Each card will allow the player to fight a monster. Winning each match will help the character gain experience points, and will receive 1 to 2 monster cards. During the match, each character will own an HP gauge (blood gauge). Any character that lets HP return to zero first, that character will lose.

title: Monster Rancher Explorer
description: Monster Rancher Explorer is a puzzle game developed and published by Tecmo. The game was introduced to the player in 2000. The characters included in Monster Rancher Explorer are taken from the original Monster Rancher game, bringing a very diverse character system. Players will control their characters through many levels spread across a tower. Players will control their characters through many levels spread across a tower. In the levels, where questions are often asked, players will be unlocked for bonus rounds when passing them, and you will also be able to get another monster so they can assist you in the next challenges. The puzzles in the game are also very diverse and require you will also need to brainstorm to be able to pass all the puzzles in Monster Rancher Explorer.

title: Monsters, Inc.
description: Get set to have a roaring good time as you scare your way across Monstropolis. Get Boo back to her world before the CDA catches up with you. It's a hair-raising comic adventure across monstrous puzzle-laden zones

title: Mortal Kombat 4
description: Mortal Kombat 4 is the fourth version of the Mortal Kombat series of fighting games developed by Midway Kombat and launched in 1997. Receiving the advantages and overcoming the disadvantages of its predecessor, the game almost becomes a complete version with vivid, beautiful images. The matches were added with beautiful attack effects, combined with fast sounds that seemed to increase the dramatic level. The gameplay will remain the same as in previous versions. However, if you want to win this version, you will have to focus on developing the character’s weapons rather than developing special moves. In the game, players need to be extremely focused, because even a moment of neglect can cause the character to pay the price of life.

title: Mr. Driller
description: Mr Driller is a real-time puzzle game that relies solely on quick-thinking and a bit of planning. Gameplay is a combination of Tetris and Boulder Dash: You have to drill down through multi-colored blocks to reach the bottom while avoiding the consequences of reckless drilling (blocks may fall on you and crush you).

title: Ms. Pac-Man: Special Color Edition
description: All of the action and fun of the first feminist arcade game can be put in the palm of your hand with MS. PAC-MAN: Special Color Edition. You take control of the yellow disk adorned with lipstick and a pink bow, better known as the lovely Ms. Pac-Man. The goal is to guide her around the maze and eat all of the dots, avoiding the four ghosts that chase you. There are power pellets located in each corner of the maze which, when eaten, turn the ghosts blue. Once this happens, the ghosts can be eaten. Occasionally, fruit will float into the maze, which can be munched for extra points. If your friends want to play along, there is an alternating Two-Player mode. As an additional bonus, a complete version of SUPER PAC-MAN is included on the cartridge. Play as the first female arcade hero in MS. PAC-MAN: Special Color Edition.

title: New Batman Adventures, The – Chaos In Gotham
description: New Batman Adventures, The – Chaos In Gotham is an action genre video game, released by publisher Ubisoft to fans in 2001. The game was inspired by the superhero character Batman. New Batman Adventures, The – Chaos In Gotham has a plot sticking to the content of the movie The new Batman Adventures. Gotham is a chaotic city, and this place has always been a concentration of crooked criminals. But from the day Batman came, people enjoyed their peaceful lives. Although most criminals are incapable of fighting Batman, Arkham Asylum is strong enough to withstand Batman’s supernatural powers. In the process of surrounding the fleeing death row inmates, Batman realizes that Arkham Asylum is the mastermind behind it all. Batman realized he was being put in, immediately he stopped before the Gotham people once again suffered disaster. The game has funny cartoon graphics and quite clear sounds, which make it become an effective entertainment game.

title: Oddworld Adventures 2
description: Abe thought he had saved the Mudokons from the evil Glukkons with the destruction of Rupture Farms. However, a new threat has arisen: the Glukkons who run Soul Storm Brewery have created an addictive drink made from Mudokon bones. To get all of the bones they need, Soul Storm has an army of Mudokon slaves excavating the Mudokon City of Death; when one of the slaves is worked to death, he becomes part of the product. The only person who can put a stop to this is Abe. You will guide Abe as he travels through the brewery and tries to destroy the boilers. Along the way, he must also try to save his people. Luckily, Abe can talk to his people and get them to help defeat the enemies and solve puzzles he faces along the way. Help Abe save the Mudokons in Oddworld Adventures 2.

title: Pac-Man: Special Color Edition
description:
One of the most popular and influential games of the 1980's, Pac-Man stars a little, yellow dot-muncher who works his way around to clear a maze of the various dots and fruit which inhabit the board.

Pac-Man's goal is continually challenged by four ghosts: The shy blue ghost Bashful (Inky), the trailing red ghost Shadow (Blinky), the fast pink ghost Speedy (Pinky), and the forgetful orange ghost Pokey (Clyde). One touch from any of these ghosts means a loss of life for Pac-Man.

Pac-Man can turn the tables on his pursuers by eating of the four Energizers located within the maze. During this time, the ghosts turn blue, and Pac-Man can eat them for bonus points. This only lasts for a limited amount of time, as the ghost's eyes float back to their center box, and regenerate to chase after Pac-Man again.

Survive a few rounds of gameplay, and be treated to humorous intermissions between Pac-Man and the ghosts.

title: Perfect Dark
description: Perfect Dark is a first-person shooter game developed by Rare and published by Nintendo to players in 2000. You will immersive your character and fight in the first perspective. The number of weapons you can carry is unlimited, from pistols to rifles or rocket launchers, snipers, and melee weapons. And each weapon will have its own capabilities, so you should use it in accordance with your missions. There are also other equipments such as shields or health items you can pick up on the map. Campaign mode will require you to go through a series of different levels to complete the mission. And there will always be difficult obstacles that hinder you from completing the task, so be very careful, accurate, and agile with intelligence to be able to overcome.

title: Pocket Bomberman
description: Pocket Bomberman is a video game produced and developed by Hudson Soft, which was brought to the audience for the first time in 1998. The game has the style of side-scrolling platformer gameplay. You will control your Bomberman to defeat all other enemies to be able to advance further goals. Each level, you will have to go through the gates from easy to difficult, and will eventually have to fight the scary Boss.
